name: chefbot
description: **ChefBot** is an AI-powered chatbot designed to help users discover new recipes, plan meals, and get personalized food recommendations. By leveraging OpenAIâ€™s GPT-4 model, ChefBot can have natural conversations with users to understand their preferences, suggest recipes based on ingredients, and even assist with meal planning. It seamlessly integrates with a recipe website, enhancing the user experience by providing tailored food recommendations through interactive dialogue.
